channel.title: Shadowdemonscape v4 [317]
channel.description:
CURRENT PROGRESS: not sure weather to start again or just quit
[size=14pt]IF YOU HAVE AN IDEA FEEL FREE TO COMMENT[/size]
i am currently working on a big project form a blank source. versions 1-3 were my experimental versions, they were leeched off of other servers and were not released, but now that i know a lot more about making these things i can make one of my own. i am using recker's v2 client (it is awesome) i plan on adding more models to it soon (and maybe releasing it)
i know i am going to make a 317 server but i am not sure about the client, i might just use whatever client works for my source, although i am thinking about using a 508+ if i can.
k now lets cut to the chase:
what you can expect on the server: shops customs custom pk custom home (from scratch, i am thinking of using the secret island) barrows ect.
what i will attempt to make: The Grand Exchange Clan Chat custom models (items & spells and i might release them) and idk what else but if i think of it i will attempt it
since this is a pre-coded blank server it shouldn't take me too long, but since i am new to making a server from scratch it might take longer than normal. you can expect this project to be done and released (*w/ anti leech*) within 2 weeks or 1 month.
*i heard recker450's story and i don't want that to happen, it wont be too hard to crack (;
so anyway i will be posting pictures of my progress when i complete them so check back to see how far i am!
if you have ideas post them and i might put them onto server!
jad: [IMG]http://i719.photobucket.com/albums/ww196/attkmast3r/jad.jpg[/img]
shops so far (bgs spec included): [IMG]http://i719.photobucket.com/albums/ww196/attkmast3r/shopsandbgsspec.jpg[/img]
Train so far:
men- [IMG]http://i719.photobucket.com/albums/ww196/attkmast3r/train-men.jpg[/img]
greater demons- [IMG]http://i719.photobucket.com/albums/ww196/attkmast3r/train-greaterdemon.jpg[/img] lava skillcape is animated :3
hellhounds- [IMG]http://i719.photobucket.com/albums/ww196/attkmast3r/train-hellhounds.jpg[/img]
i modified all of their hps to 999
KBD: [IMG]http://i719.photobucket.com/albums/ww196/attkmast3r/KBD.jpg[/img]

item.title: Shadowdemonscape v4 [317]

item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

@icestorm
i followed a tutorial on how to make bluurrs client work on my server and i figured out that it makes you do some weird emote and when you walk it disconnects you. it is fixed now (:

@recker

lol it does

and it is a blank source (said that at least 3 times)

Read full topic
